name: Mini Super Slick Tinted Lip Balm
about: What it is: A travel-friendly moisture-boosting lip balm infused with rose oil for a soothing effect...Formulation Type: Lip Balm & Treatment..Benefits: Hydrating..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Rose Oil: Soothes and hydrates lips with an abundance of antioxidants...Ingredient Callouts: This product is cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know: Featuring a custom-dome tip for easy application, this unique oil-balm melts into lips on contact, leaving a sheer tint of color with wet, glossy shine. Swipe once for sheer, juicy color or layer for more payoff. Mini Super Slick Balm was created for an on-the-go lifestyle; a built-in magnet system in the cap lets product stack together for compact storage. Custom packaging is composed of 70% sustainable natural origin which to reduce the use of plastic.
ingredients: -Rose Oil: Soothes and hydrates lips with an abundance of antioxidants. ..Diisostearyl Malate, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, Vp/Hexadecene Copolymer, Polyethylene, Ozokerite, Parfum (Fragrance), Rosa Canina Fruit Extract, Butyrospermum Parkii Butter (Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter), Limonene, Citric Acid, Aluminum Hydroxide, Mica, Diethylhexyl Syringylidenemalonate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride +/- May Contain Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 15850 (Red 6), Ci 15850 (Red 7), Ci 19140 (Yellow 5 Lake), Ci 42090 (Blue 1 Lake), Ci 45410 (Red 28 Lake), Ci 77491 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77492 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77499 (Iron Oxides).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Glide across lips for a sheer tint of color. .-To amplify color and shine, apply multiple coats...Beauty tip:.-For a stained lip look, blot with a tissue after applying.
